about_the_game:
Step Into the Shoes of a Legendary Medieval Merchant!
In Trade Rivals - Goblin Age, you’ll manage your medieval shop in a vibrant world filled with goblins, wizards, elves, and humans. Your goal? Dominate the market by mastering pricing strategies, securing rare goods, and outmaneuvering your competitors. But beware—your rivals won’t play fair. They’ll curse your business or snatch deals right from under your nose!

Key Features:

  • Competitive Multiplayer Fun: Challenge up to 3 friends in a battle of wits and tactics. Become the most popular shopkeeper or outlast everyone else to win.

  • Evolving Economic Scenarios: Each game begins with one of 25 unique scenarios, changing inflation rates and market conditions to keep you on your toes.

  • Black Market Deals: Obtain rare and legendary items that can draw famous characters from fantastical worlds to your shop.

  • A World of Fantasy: Sell potions, weapons, scrolls, and more to a diverse cast of customers, including goblins, orcs, elves, and wizards.

  • Unique Challenges: Use cunning strategies to disrupt your rivals while growing your business empire.

Can you thrive in a cutthroat medieval economy and rise to fame? Step into Trade Rivals - Goblin Age and prove your worth!

name: Trade Rivals - Goblin Age

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 / Windows 11
  • Processor: i5-7500 or similar
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 / Windows 11
  • Processor: i5-10600 or similar
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2070 SUPER or Similar
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 16 GB available space

short_description: Trade Rivals-Goblin Age is a competitive multiplayer game for up to 4 players where you manage a medieval shop. Outsmart your rivals by setting the best prices, attracting customers, and navigating ever-changing economic scenarios. Will you become the most popular or the last one standing?
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Turkish, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Ukrainian, Dutch, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support
